definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: room, chamber, hall, cell, lishka (NH id. Targum [[לִשְׁכְּתָא]]; cf. also [[נִשְׁכָּה]]; on the lishka v. Now:Arch. ii. 37, 52, 79; Bo:Geogr.I, xvii. 438 (ed. Leusd.) comp. Gk. le/sxh, cf. Rs:Sem. i. 236 (2nd ed. 254) al.) ;—´[[ל]] Ez Eze 40:38 +; cstr. [[לִשְׁכַּת]] 2Ki 23:11 +; c. [[ה]] loc. [[לִשְׁכָָּתָה]] 1Sa 9:22; pl. [[לְשָׁכוֹת]] Ez Eze 40:17 +; cstr. [[לִשְׁכוֹת]] Ne 10:38 +;—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: of room connected with a sanctuary ([[בָּמָה]]), where sacrif. meal was eaten 1Sa 9:22, insert also prob. 1Sa 1:18 (LXX We Dr Klo Bu).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: connected with Sol.'s temple, where wine offered to Rechabites Je 35:2, Je 35:4; cf. v:Je 35:4, v:Je 35:4 one where prophecy read Je 36:10 (both these appar. open, cf. Gie:Je 35:2); cf. [[בַּפַּרְוׇרִים]]…[[לִשְׁכַּת נְתַן־מֶלֶח הַסָּרִיס]] 2Ki 23:11; used of Levites' cells 1Ch 9:33; = store-rooms v:1Ch 9:26 (‖[[אׂחָרוֹת]]), 1Ch 23:28, 1Ch 28:12, 2Ch 31:11.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: in Ezek.'s temple, cells for priests, singers, etc. Ez Eze 40:17, Eze 40:17, Eze 40:38, Eze 40:44, Eze 40:45, Eze 40:46 + Eze 41:10 (del. Co Bthl), Eze 42:1, Eze 42:4, Eze 42:7, Eze 42:8, Eze 42:11 + v:Eze 42:12 (del. Co Bthl) ; in three tiers, cf. [[הָעֶלְיוֹנׂת]] ´[[הַלְּ]] Eze 42:5 (vid. v:Eze 42:3), (Eze 45:5 rd. [[עָרִים לָשֶׁבֶת]] LXX Sm Co Sgfr:KauAT Bthl); [[הַקּׂדֶשׁ]] ´[[ל]] for sacred uses Eze 42:13, Eze 42:13, Eze 42:13, Eze 44:19, Eze 46:19.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: in second temple, as store-rooms Ezr 8:29, Ne 10:38, Ne 10:38 (‖[[בֵּית הָאוֹחָר]]), v:Ne 10:39; used by individuals Ezr 10:6, Ne 13:5 ([[גְּדוֹלָה]] ´[[ל]]), v:Ne 13:8, in gen. v:Ne 13:4, v:Ne 13:9.
of scribe's room in royal palace Je 36:12, Je 36:20, Je 36:21.
